replies.body: when is the new {{champion:121}} skin? just wondering
Rumor is the new 3250 RP skin will be for Khazix
[Muri'Kha needs to be his next skin!](http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/attachment.php?attachmentid=945766)

the best thing ever made. Every kill you hear an Eagle in the background. Then jets fly overhead with every ace as  he is alive on the team. If Penta ...the american flag appears and fireworks goes off with the National Anthem starts playing and kha'zix salutes the flag.
$50 would be worth it!
I believe we should start a damn petition for this!

Logged in to up-vote Every comment in or pertaining to this thread. I'd give $50 or gladly more for this skin with all those bell and whistles and I'd give $40 for a good 'ol legendary quality Muri'Kha. 

Uncle Ryze Want's YOU
      {{champion:13}} 
To Make This Skin
Not even american, but that would be the best thing ever.
Arazee, just look at the Team Spirit {{champion:34}} , and Bird of Prey {{champion:34}}  and you should hopefully get the joke
You have to make this a thread! This is too good to pass up! Even better than the American{{champion:59}} idea. I would so donate $55 towards it.
needs jet engines on evolved wings, isolation bonus appears as a star under the enemy, the w is a bald eagle that flies at the enemies, that's all i can think up for now.
SOLD!!!{{summoner:6}} {{item:3301}}

Sweet!!! Lumbearjack's Muri'Kha missing a claw nail on his left foot, though, you need a good eye to notice it.

But this skin concept is awesome nonetheless!
Now, they need to make Praying Kha'Zix!

Or Man'Tis... whatever makes sense!
Everyone please up vote this so Riot can make it. Post it on Facebook, spread the word!
I hope it is for Taric {{champion:44}}
Officer Taric, hammer is a boombox radio and his shield is a badge. The shirt, of course, is only buttoned half way up, because he is so manly.
They need an "Alien" {{champion:121}}  skin so when he goes against a Headhunter {{champion:107}} it will be Alien Vs. Predator
THERES NOT MUCH COMMENTS! NOWS MY CHANCE .... uhhh Potato.
great job, mate!
Nailed it.
but Kerrigan is the Queen of Blades
Wrong blade queen.  This is modeled after the Lady of Pain from Planescape.  When you see the color scheme in game it is a lot more obvious.
Sorry but my ex-girlfriend is the Queen of Blades...
i'm so glad i wasn't the only one thinking this.
I think Elise looks more like Kerrigan.
what about me {{champion:39}}

Riot,can you make Pool Party {{champion:61}} for this summer,where her ball is a volleyball and she's in a binki, and also, when she uses her w,water will be on the bottom
 and the same thing for her ult so please make that skin Riot?
I think you meant Pool party {{champion:79}} , Whose ball is a beach ball with the riot logo, also in a bikini.

Pool Party:

{{champion:57}} Palm Tree with Jamaican Accent, Coconuts, and sunglasses

{{champion:154}} Clear/Blue Zac with speedo

{{champion:222}} Bikini with inflatable shark that sprays water and water balloons

{{champion:15}} Lifeguard onepiece with life preserver

{{champion:117}} Towel wrapped around head, mini bikini, pool noodle, fish
i'd prefer {{champion:117}} to be in a japanese anime one piece swimsuit. i think a yordle in a bikini will be kinda creepy

Pool Party Jinx would definitely lob water ballons with fishbones. Her mini-gun would be a super-soaker. Zap could become a high-velocity water cannon. Chompers water mines. And her ult... a giant torpedo.
BIKINI {{champion:79}} !!!
For 1350 RP? I'm not impressed.
idk all new spell effects and a new recall seems worth 1350 for me
{{champion:107}} I got a toggling hood for less!

It not just that..it new sound effects too. 

All her spells, her dance, and even her walking has brand new sounds to them. While Night Hunter Rengar did get an epic toggling hood..all his sound effects are the same as classic Rengar. That why Night Hunter Rengar is only 975 while Blade Queen Lissandra and DragonSlayer Panteon new particles and sound effects grant them a 1350 price.
It would be cool if her Q was just Lissandra chucking a {{item:1055}}  at someone. Hence the blade skin name.
AND {{champion:267}} ?? WHERE IS {{champion:267}} ???
when do we get Pyramid Head {{champion:23}} ?????????
Yes, rito pl0x. I desire the punishment
